name: Valorant - Weapon Spectre page concept design
description:
Here you can find design of Weapon Spectre for the new Riot Games project called Valorant.


I already got the key for closed beta and I’ll tell you this game is very cool! In this concept, you can see all the information about the weapon, its damage to different points of the body and all skins with prices.


What's inside :

- Weapon Information

- Weapon Page

- Damage Blocks

- Skins Block


I am always available for new projects!

📧 My Email : unepickid@gmail.com
